$interpreted: Ru-yi: The tent's set up! This poor whale needs a nap and a HUGE meal~~
Hanbei: Luckily for us, this place is stocked full of fruits. Otherwise, we'd be eating tree bark!
Ru-yi: How much longer do we need to walk until we reach the Rune Academy~?
Hutchinson: Forgive me. A gentleman must never complain without good cause...it's just my legs are killing me...
Hanbei: Hmph! Come on now! If the Rune Academy were that easy to find, it'd be full of bumpkins trying to get in~
Sophie: Guess we owe it to Clark for lending us this Rune Lens to help lead the way.
Ru-yi: No matter how many times I look, it's still so beautiful~This tool is absolutely marvelous!
Sophie: Yeah! Clark said that after we enter the Valley, we should follow the light and walk for about two days, then we should arrive.
Sophie: Well, we've already walked for two days. We should be arriving tomorrow morning.
Ru-yi: Great. I don't want to spend another night in the forest. It's so scary...
Hanbei: It's just a valley, what's there to be afraid of?
Ru-yi: Hanbei, don't you remember? One time, we were travelling with Morgan and...
Ru-yi: We spent a night in the forest and those Panthers were so fierce to us!
Ru-yi: I was so scared!!!! WAAAAHHHHH!!!!! WAAAHH!!!
Hutchinson: Ru-yi, dear. You must relax, otherwise you'll get dehydrated again.
Hutchinson: Come now. Drink some water.
Ru-yi: *whimper*...thank you...Hutchinson.
Sophie: Why can't I remember the Panthers you're talking about?
Hutchinson: Darling, you had a fever so bad it was making your mind fuzzy. It's no wonder you can't remember.
Hutchinson: Half of Whistlewood Valley is the Panthers territory. They aren't very...
Hanbei: ...welcoming to outsiders.
Hanbei: Morgan begged for them to allow us to stay the night. They refused to even consider it. We had to pack up and leave in the middle of the night.
Hanbei: This fruit tastes like garbage...*spit*...!
Hutchinson: After all, Morgan wasn't the best with disagreements...
Sophie: Now that I think of it...if Dad wasn't such a nice guy...
Sophie: ...Mom never would have left...what an idiot...
Hutchinson: Sophie, don't talk about your father like that.
Hutchinson: Morgan helped us a lot. More than you know.
Sophie: Help!? Don't you remember how he died?
Ru-yi: Sophie...
Hanbei: Five years ago, Morgan went to go save a boy who had been carried away by a flood. He wouldn't listen to the cries of Hutchinson and I...
Hutchinson: ...In the end, no one was saved...
Sophie: Yeah, that's what happened. Dad sacrificed his own life and no one even thanked him for it.
Sophie: ...Not worth it at all. What a fool.
Ru-yi: I still remember when Sophie would call Morgan a fool. He would always smile and say──
Sophie: "The world always needs fools like me." Well, guess he never thought that I don't want to be the daughter of a fool~
Hutchinson: Sophie...
Sophie: So, I decided a long time ago! That I would never be a fool like my father!
Sophie: And I'll never be a "good" person!
Hanbei: Hmph! Well if it isn't Tweedle-dee and Tweedledum! You're no better than your dad!
Sophie: Tweedledee! I-I-I I'm not like my dad!
Hanbei: Hah! Then who was the one that saved Elio?
Hanbei: Who was the one that took in Rune, a bumbling slave at the time?
Hanbei: And who was the one that risked danger to help that buffoon of a thief save that croissant!?
Sophie: Th-That was only because if I didn't h-h-help them...
Hanbei: If you're not considered a good person, then good people don't exist! I'm just dying to see the day that you turn into a “bad” person!
Sophie: I don't wanna be a good person and I don't wanna be a bad person either!
Hanbei: Look at you! You don't know what you're talking about. The apple doesn't fall far from the tree!
Sophie: I just...I just don't want to suffer the same fate as my father.
Sophie: Hanbei, what right do you have to speak of me like this!?
Ru-yi: Waaaaahhh~~~~~
Sophie: Ru-yi?
Ru-yi: I don't l-l-like it when you fight~~Whenever you fight, I get so scared~~Waaaaahh~~
Sophie: ...I'm sorry we scared you.
Ru-yi: *sob*...*sniffle*...will-will you two make up?
Sophie: ...Of course! No need to cry~
Sophie: I'm too sensitive...I'm sorry, Hanbei...
Hanbei: ......
Hutchinson: Sophie has apologized. Hanbei, don't you think──
Hanbei: Hmph! I won't apologize to that stupid, orange-haired bum-bum!
Ru-yi: ...*sob*...
Sophie: Everything will be fine! Why don't you guys head to bed?
Ru-yi: ──And you, Sophie?
Sophie: I'm gonna stay here for a bit and...think things over.
Ru-yi: I'll stay with──
Hutchinson: Let Sophie have some alone time. We spend a lot of time together. People need some time to themselves.
Ru-yi: Yeah...you're right...
Hutchinson: Sophie, you're mad because...there's something to what Hanbei's saying, isn't it?
Sophie: I...
Hutchinson: It's okay, don't worry. Sometimes the answer lies where you least expect it.
Hutchinson: I know that's how Morgan was...
Sophie: ......
Sophie: What was my dad thinking...?
Ru-yi: Waaahhh~~Sophie, help!!!!
Hanbei: You rotten custards!!
Sophie: What happened? Who tied you up like this!?
Hanbei: Come down and face me like an animal! What do you think I am, a hamster? I'll show you!
Ru-yi: Waaahhhh~ Sophie~~It was them~~
Naughty Panther: Hahaha! Stupid, fat whale.
Mischievious Panther: The hedgehog...HAHAHA...turns into a...WAHAHA...a ball!!!!
Hanbei: GET DOWN HERE!!! I'm gonna destroy you!!!
Naughty Panther: Hehehe~ And how do you expect to do that, being all short and ya know, shaped like a ball! WAHAHAHAH!
Sophie: Hey! What are you two doing!?
Naughty Panther: Hunting! We're definitely getting first place...
Mischievious Panther: ...for this hunting exam!
Naughty Panther: Shhhh...slower...hehehe.
Mischievious Panther: Shhhhhhh...quiet!
Fatima: WHAT ARE YOU DOING!!!!!!!!!
Naughty Panther: AAAAHHHHH!!!!!
Mischievious Panther: OWWWW!!!!!! OUCH!!!!!
Naughty Panther: Miss Fatima, that's against the rules!
Mischievious Panther: We were just about to catch our prey!
Fatima: Hunting is the sacred tradition of the Panthers. It's only you foolish children who take it to be a game!
Fatima: Who gave you permission to run out here!?
Mischievious Panther: All the elders went out hunting and we were bored...
Naughty Panther: Yeah! Yeah! We just wanted to refine our hunting sk──
Naughty Panther: OUCH!!
Fatima: This is not part of the Panther's hunting territory.
Fatima: I'm sorry. These children understand nothing.
Ru-yi: I thought we were going to get eaten...
Fatima: Tell them sorry, NOW!
Naughty Panther: I'm sorry, we were wrong...
Mischievious Panther: You can play with us! Wait, no. We'll play with you!
Ru-yi: Oh...okay. I forgive you.
Ru-yi: You better not do that again!
Sophie: I thought Panthers hated outsiders...
Fatima: ...You can thank Charle for that. The Panthers have changed their attitude towards foreigners.
Ru-yi: Sophie! Their fur is hard and prickly! It's so different from Hutchinson's!
Mischievious Panther: Eh...that's cuz' you messed it all up.
Sophie: Hehe...the Panthers are so much more interesting than I imagined.
Fatima: Actually, these naughty children enjoy making new friends.
Fatima: Us elders can no longer use those outdated ideas to keep them from interacting with the outside world.
Sophie: Wow, sounds like Miss Fatima really does care about them...
Fatima: Of course. The children are the future of the Panther tribe.
Fatima: All I can do...is protect them.
Sophie: Protect the children...that's what my father always used to say.
Fatima: So where are you all headed?
Sophie: We need to get to the Rune Academy as soon as possible.
Fatima: The Rune Academy? Just ahead is a little shortcut. It'll save you a lot of time.
Sophie: Thank you so much Miss Fatima!
Fatima: However, I've heard that there have been some issues at the Rune Academy. I'd be extra careful if I were you.
Fatima: Play time is over. Let's head back to the tribe.
Naughty Panther: Fine~~~Bye-bye, Ru-yi!!! Bye-bye, Hutchinson!!!
Fatima: Take care.

Model.Text: The tent's set up! This poor whale needs a nap and a HUGE meal~~
Luckily for us, this place is stocked full of fruits. Otherwise, we'd be eating tree bark!
How much longer do we need to walk until we reach the Rune Academy~?
Forgive me. A gentleman must never complain without good cause...it's just my legs are killing me...
Hmph! Come on now! If the Rune Academy were that easy to find, it'd be full of bumpkins trying to get in~
Guess we owe it to Clark for lending us this Rune Lens to help lead the way.
No matter how many times I look, it's still so beautiful~This tool is absolutely marvelous!
Yeah! Clark said that after we enter the Valley, we should follow the light and walk for about two days, then we should arrive.
Well, we've already walked for two days. We should be arriving tomorrow morning.
Great. I don't want to spend another night in the forest. It's so scary...
It's just a valley, what's there to be afraid of?
Hanbei, don't you remember? One time, we were travelling with Morgan and...
We spent a night in the forest and those Panthers were so fierce to us!

Half of Whistlewood Valley is the Panthers territory. They aren't very...
...welcoming to outsiders.

Morgan helped us a lot. More than you know.

Sophie...
Five years ago, Morgan went to go save a boy who had been carried away by a flood. He wouldn't listen to the cries of Hutchinson and I...
...In the end, no one was saved...
Yeah, that's what happened. Dad sacrificed his own life and no one even thanked him for it.
...Not worth it at all. What a fool.
I still remember when Sophie would call Morgan a fool. He would always smile and say──
"The world always needs fools like me." Well, guess he never thought that I don't want to be the daughter of a fool~
Sophie...
So, I decided a long time ago! That I would never be a fool like my father!
And I'll never be a "good" person!
Hmph! Well if it isn't Tweedle-dee and Tweedledum! You're no better than your dad!
Tweedledee! I-I-I I'm not like my dad!
Hah! Then who was the one that saved Elio?
Who was the one that took in Rune, a bumbling slave at the time?
And who was the one that risked danger to help that buffoon of a thief save that croissant!?
Th-That was only because if I didn't h-h-help them...
If you're not considered a good person, then good people don't exist! I'm just dying to see the day that you turn into a “bad” person!
I don't wanna be a good person and I don't wanna be a bad person either!
Look at you! You don't know what you're talking about. The apple doesn't fall far from the tree!
I just...I just don't want to suffer the same fate as my father.
Hanbei, what right do you have to speak of me like this!?
Waaaaahhh~~~~~
Ru-yi?
I don't l-l-like it when you fight~~Whenever you fight, I get so scared~~Waaaaahh~~
...I'm sorry we scared you.
*sob*...*sniffle*...will-will you two make up?
...Of course! No need to cry~
I'm too sensitive...I'm sorry, Hanbei...
Sophie has apologized. Hanbei, don't you think──
Hmph! I won't apologize to that stupid, orange-haired bum-bum!
Everything will be fine! Why don't you guys head to bed?
──And you, Sophie?
I'm gonna stay here for a bit and...think things over.
I'll stay with──
Let Sophie have some alone time. We spend a lot of time together. People need some time to themselves.
Yeah...you're right...
Sophie, you're mad because...there's something to what Hanbei's saying, isn't it?
It's okay, don't worry. Sometimes the answer lies where you least expect it.
I know that's how Morgan was...
What was my dad thinking...?
Waaahhh~~Sophie, help!!!!
You rotten custards!!
What happened? Who tied you up like this!?
Come down and face me like an animal! What do you think I am, a hamster? I'll show you!
Waaahhhh~ Sophie~~It was them~~
Hahaha! Stupid, fat whale.
The hedgehog...HAHAHA...turns into a...WAHAHA...a ball!!!!
GET DOWN HERE!!! I'm gonna destroy you!!!
Hehehe~ And how do you expect to do that, being all short and ya know, shaped like a ball! WAHAHAHAH!
Hey! What are you two doing!?
Hunting! We're definitely getting first place...
...for this hunting exam!

WHAT ARE YOU DOING!!!!!!!!!
AAAAHHHHH!!!!!
OWWWW!!!!!! OUCH!!!!!
Miss Fatima, that's against the rules!
We were just about to catch our prey!
Hunting is the sacred tradition of the Panthers. It's only you foolish children who take it to be a game!
Who gave you permission to run out here!?
All the elders went out hunting and we were bored...
Yeah! Yeah! We just wanted to refine our hunting sk──
OUCH!!

I'm sorry. These children understand nothing.
I thought we were going to get eaten...
Tell them sorry, NOW!
I'm sorry, we were wrong...
You can play with us! Wait, no. We'll play with you!
Oh...okay. I forgive you.
You better not do that again!
I thought Panthers hated outsiders...
...You can thank Charle for that. The Panthers have changed their attitude towards foreigners.
Sophie! Their fur is hard and prickly! It's so different from Hutchinson's!
Eh...that's cuz' you messed it all up.
Hehe...the Panthers are so much more interesting than I imagined.
Actually, these naughty children enjoy making new friends.
Us elders can no longer use those outdated ideas to keep them from interacting with the outside world.
Wow, sounds like Miss Fatima really does care about them...
Of course. The children are the future of the Panther tribe.
All I can do...is protect them.
Protect the children...that's what my father always used to say.
So where are you all headed?
We need to get to the Rune Academy as soon as possible.
The Rune Academy? Just ahead is a little shortcut. It'll save you a lot of time.
Thank you so much Miss Fatima!
However, I've heard that there have been some issues at the Rune Academy. I'd be extra careful if I were you.
Play time is over. Let's head back to the tribe.
Fine~~~Bye-bye, Ru-yi!!! Bye-bye, Hutchinson!!!
Take care.

Dad sacrificed his own life and no one even thanked him for it.","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_014","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_12_002","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Not worth it at all. What a fool.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_12_003","SpeakerName":"Ru-yi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3189c3","IconName":"t3189c3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I still remember when Sophie would call Morgan a fool. He would always smile and say\u2500\u2500","sfxName":"t3189c3_story_002","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_12_004","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"\"The world always needs fools like me.\" Well, guess he never thought that I don't want to be the daughter of a fool~","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_001","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_12_005","SpeakerName":"Hutchinson","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3190c3","IconName":"h3190c3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sophie...","sfxName":"h3190c3_story_013","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_13_000","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So, I decided a long time ago! That I would never be a fool like my father!","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_013","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_13_001","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"And I'll never be a \"good\" person!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_14_000","SpeakerName":"Hanbei","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3191c3","IconName":"t3191c3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hmph! Well if it isn't Tweedle-dee and Tweedledum! You're no better than your dad!","sfxName":"t3191c3_story_002","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_14_001","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Tweedledee! I-I-I I'm not like my dad!","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_020","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_14_002","SpeakerName":"Hanbei","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3191c3","IconName":"t3191c3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hah! Then who was the one that saved Elio?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_14_003","SpeakerName":"Hanbei","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3191c3","IconName":"t3191c3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Who was the one that took in Rune, a bumbling slave at the time?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_14_004","SpeakerName":"Hanbei","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3191c3","IconName":"t3191c3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"And who was the one that risked danger to help that buffoon of a thief save that croissant!?","sfxName":"t3191c3_story_009","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_15_000","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Th-That was only because if I didn't h-h-help them...","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_021","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_15_001","SpeakerName":"Hanbei","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3191c3","IconName":"t3191c3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"If you're not considered a good person, then good people don't exist! I'm just dying to see the day that you turn into a \u201cbad\u201d person!","sfxName":"t3191c3_story_012","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_15_002","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I don't wanna be a good person and I don't wanna be a bad person either!","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_016","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_16_000","SpeakerName":"Hanbei","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3191c3","IconName":"t3191c3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Look at you! You don't know what you're talking about. The apple doesn't fall far from the tree!","sfxName":"t3191c3_story_004","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_16_001","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I just...I just don't want to suffer the same fate as my father.","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_024","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_16_002","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hanbei, what right do you have to speak of me like this!?","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_026_ver2","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_17_000","SpeakerName":"Ru-yi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3189c3","IconName":"t3189c3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Waaaaahhh~~~~~","sfxName":"t3189c3_story_011","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_18_000","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ru-yi?","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_020","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_18_001","SpeakerName":"Ru-yi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3189c3","IconName":"t3189c3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I course! No need to cry~","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_013","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_20_000","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm too sensitive...I'm sorry, Hanbei...","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_024","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_20_001","SpeakerName":"Hanbei","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3191c3","IconName":"t3191c3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_20_002","SpeakerName":"Hutchinson","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3190c3","IconName":"h3190c3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sophie has apologized. Hanbei, don't you think\u2500\u2500","sfxName":"h3190c3_story_016","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_20_003","SpeakerName":"Hanbei","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3191c3","IconName":"t3191c3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hmph! I won't apologize to that stupid, orange-haired bum-bum!","sfxName":"t3191c3_story_002","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_21_000","SpeakerName":"Ru-yi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3189c3","IconName":"t3189c3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...*sob*...","sfxName":"t3189c3_story_012","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_21_001","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Everything will be fine! Why don't you guys head to bed?","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_003","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_21_002","SpeakerName":"Ru-yi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3189c3","IconName":"t3189c3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"\u2500\u2500And you, Sophie?","sfxName":"t3189c3_story_010","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_21_003","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm gonna stay here for a bit and...think things over.","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_014","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_21_004","SpeakerName":"Ru-yi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3189c3","IconName":"t3189c3_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'll stay with\u2500\u2500","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_21_005","SpeakerName":"Hutchinson","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3190c3","IconName":"h3190c3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Let Sophie have some alone time. We spend a lot of time together. People need some time to themselves.","sfxName":"h3190c3_story_005","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_21_006","SpeakerName":"Ru-yi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3189c3","IconName":"t3189c3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Yeah...you're right...","sfxName":"t3189c3_story_002","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_22_000","SpeakerName":"Hutchinson","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3190c3","IconName":"h3190c3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sophie, you're mad because...there's something to what Hanbei's saying, isn't it?","sfxName":"h3190c3_story_001","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_22_001","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I...","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_024","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_22_002","SpeakerName":"Hutchinson","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3190c3","IconName":"h3190c3_sp1","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It's okay, don't worry. Sometimes the answer lies where you least expect it.","sfxName":"h3190c3_story_006","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_22_003","SpeakerName":"Hutchinson","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3190c3","IconName":"h3190c3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I know that's how Morgan was...","sfxName":"h3190c3_story_002","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_23_000","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_24_000","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What was my dad thinking...?","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_022","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_25_000","SpeakerName":"Ru-yi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3189c3","IconName":"t3189c3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Waaahhh~~Sophie, help!!!!","sfxName":"t3189c3_story_016","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_25_001","SpeakerName":"Hanbei","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3191c3","IconName":"t3191c3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You rotten custards!!","sfxName":"t3191c3_story_008","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_26_000","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"What happened? Stupid, fat whale.","sfxName":"human_male_kid_06","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_28_001","SpeakerName":"Mischievious Panther","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3200c1","IconName":"t3200c1_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"The hedgehog...HAHAHA...turns into a...WAHAHA...a ball!!!!","sfxName":"human_male_teen_06","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_29_000","SpeakerName":"Hanbei","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3191c3","IconName":"t3191c3_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"GET DOWN HERE!!! I'm gonna destroy you!!!","sfxName":"t3191c3_story_008","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_29_001","SpeakerName":"Naughty Panther","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3200c1","IconName":"t3200c1_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hehehe~ And how do you expect to do that, being all short and ya know, shaped like a ball! We're definitely getting first place...","sfxName":"human_male_kid_01","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_30_002","SpeakerName":"Mischievious Panther","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3200c1","IconName":"t3200c1_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...for this hunting exam!","sfxName":"human_male_teen_08","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_31_000","SpeakerName":"Naughty Panther","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3200c1","IconName":"t3200c1_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Shhhh...slower...hehehe.","sfxName":"human_male_kid_04","sfxVolume":0.5},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_31_001","SpeakerName":"Mischievious Panther","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3200c1","IconName":"t3200c1_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Shhhhhhh...quiet!","sfxName":"human_male_teen_03","sfxVolume":0.5},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_32_000","SpeakerName":"Fatima","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0026","IconName":"t0026s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"WHAT ARE YOU DOING!!!!!!!!!","sfxName":"t0026_story_005","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_33_000","SpeakerName":"Naughty Panther","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3200c1","IconName":"t3200c1_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"AAAAHHHHH!!!!!","sfxName":"human_male_kid_07","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_33_001","SpeakerName":"Mischievious Panther","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3200c1","IconName":"t3200c1_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"OWWWW!!!!!! OUCH!!!!!","sfxName":"human_male_teen_12","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_34_000","SpeakerName":"Naughty Panther","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3200c1","IconName":"t3200c1_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Miss Fatima, that's against the rules!","sfxName":"human_male_teen_03","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_34_001","SpeakerName":"Mischievious Panther","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3200c1","IconName":"t3200c1_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"We were just about to catch our prey!","sfxName":"human_male_kid_01","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_35_000","SpeakerName":"Fatima","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0026","IconName":"t0026s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hunting is the sacred tradition of the Panthers. It's only you foolish children who take it to be a game!","sfxName":"t0026_story_022","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_35_001","SpeakerName":"Fatima","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0026","IconName":"t0026s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Who gave you permission to run out here!?","sfxName":"t0026_story_003","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_35_002","SpeakerName":"Mischievious Panther","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3200c1","IconName":"t3200c1_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"All the elders went out hunting and we were bored...","sfxName":"human_male_kid_03","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_35_003","SpeakerName":"Naughty Panther","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3200c1","IconName":"t3200c1_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Yeah! Yeah! We just wanted to refine our hunting sk\u2500\u2500","sfxName":"human_male_teen_01","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_35_004","SpeakerName":"Naughty Panther","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3200c1","IconName":"t3200c1_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"OUCH!!","sfxName":"human_male_teen_12","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_36_000","SpeakerName":"Fatima","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0026","IconName":"t0026s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"This is not part of the Panther's hunting territory.","sfxName":"t0026_story_014","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_36_001","SpeakerName":"Fatima","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0026","IconName":"t0026s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm sorry. These children understand nothing.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_36_002","SpeakerName":"Ru-yi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3189c3","IconName":"t3189c3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I thought we were going to get eaten...","sfxName":"t3189c3_story_012","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_37_000","SpeakerName":"Fatima","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0026","IconName":"t0026s5_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Tell them sorry, NOW!","sfxName":"t0026_story_003","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_38_000","SpeakerName":"Naughty Panther","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3200c1","IconName":"t3200c1_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm sorry, we were wrong...","sfxName":"human_male_kid_03","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_38_001","SpeakerName":"Mischievious Panther","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3200c1","IconName":"t3200c1_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You can play with us! Wait, no. We'll play with you!","sfxName":"human_male_teen_01","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_38_002","SpeakerName":"Ru-yi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3189c3","IconName":"t3189c3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh...okay. I forgive you.","sfxName":"t3189c3_story_002","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_38_003","SpeakerName":"Ru-yi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3189c3","IconName":"t3189c3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You better not do that again!","sfxName":"t3189c3_story_003","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_39_000","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I thought Panthers hated outsiders...","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_023","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_39_001","SpeakerName":"Fatima","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0026","IconName":"t0026s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...You can thank Charle for that. The Panthers have changed their attitude towards foreigners.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_40_000","SpeakerName":"Ru-yi","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3189c3","IconName":"t3189c3_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sophie! Their fur is hard and prickly! It's so different from Hutchinson's!","sfxName":"t3189c3_story_015","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_40_001","SpeakerName":"Mischievious Panther","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3200c1","IconName":"t3200c1_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Eh...that's cuz' you messed it all up.","sfxName":"human_male_teen_07","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_41_000","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Hehe...the Panthers are so much more interesting than I imagined.","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_001","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_41_001","SpeakerName":"Fatima","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0026","IconName":"t0026s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Actually, these naughty children enjoy making new friends.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_41_002","SpeakerName":"Fatima","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0026","IconName":"t0026s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Us elders can no longer use those outdated ideas to keep them from interacting with the outside world.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_42_000","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Wow, sounds like Miss Fatima really does care about them...","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_013","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_42_001","SpeakerName":"Fatima","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0026","IconName":"t0026s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Of course. The children are the future of the Panther tribe.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_42_002","SpeakerName":"Fatima","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0026","IconName":"t0026s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"All I can do...is protect them.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_42_003","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Protect the children...that's what my father always used to say.","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_014","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_43_000","SpeakerName":"Fatima","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0026","IconName":"t0026s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So where are you all headed?","sfxName":"t0026_story_012","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_43_001","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"We need to get to the Rune Academy as soon as possible.","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_013","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_43_002","SpeakerName":"Fatima","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0026","IconName":"t0026s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"The Rune Academy? Just ahead is a little shortcut. It'll save you a lot of time.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_44_000","SpeakerName":"Sophie","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0150","IconName":"h0150s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Thank you so much Miss Fatima!","sfxName":"h0150sx_story_004","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_208_001_dialog_english##_44_001","SpeakerName":"Fatima","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t0026","IconName":"t0026s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"However, I've heard that there have been some issues at the Rune Academy.
